name: Passport to Paradise
author: Jacob DeBenedetto

sections.description:
Passport to Paradise is designed to improve sale incentive by creating rewarding goals for your team. Simply add users and apply points according to performance.

Additional Features

  • Add, edit, or delete names
  • insert custom shortcodes to display specific user points

Shortcode Example

  • [ptp name=”John Doe”]

Need a feature? Make a request on the support page
